name: Overview
description: Comprehensive overview of all metrics tracked on each chain, including TVL, Fees, Revenue, Volume, and protocols on each chain

name: Chains
description: Combined TVL, Fees, Volume and other metrics by chain

name: Yields: All Pools
description: Pools by APY, TVL, and other metrics on all chains

name: Stablecoins by Market Cap
description: Total market cap of stable assets

name: Revenue by Protocol
description: Subset of fees that the protocol collects for itself, usually going to the protocol treasury, the team, or distributed among token holders. This doesn't include any fees distributed to liquidity providers
